Package uk.co.flax.biosolr.ontology.core.cache

extends java.lang.Object

    Timed least-recently used cache implementation.
    Author:
    Matt Pearce

    • Constructor Detail

      • TimedLRUCache

        public TimedLRUCache​(int capacity,
                     long storeTime)
        Create a new timed least-recently used cache with a given capacity and maximum storage time.
        Parameters:
        capacity - the maximum capacity of the cache.
        storeTime - the maximum length of time to store an entry in the cache, in milliseconds.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if capacity or storeTime is less than 1.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        public V get​(K key)
        Description copied from interface: Cache
        Get the cache entry for the given key.
        Specified by:
        get in interface Cache<K,V>
        Parameters:
        key - the key to retrieve.
        Returns:
        the cached value of the key, or null if the key does not exist in the cache.

      • put

        public void put​(K key,
                V value)
        Description copied from interface: Cache
        Put a value in the cache. Any previously existing value with the same key will be overwritten.
        Specified by:
        put in interface Cache<K,V>
        Parameters:
        key - the key for the value.
        value - the value.

        Description copied from interface: Cache
        Clear the cache, emptying all internal storage.
